name: QuickRules
signal_source: Productivity app users complain about 'steep learning curve' and need for apps that 'automate intelligently' without complexity
description: Voice-activated personal rule system that creates automation through natural language commands
target_user: Professionals who want automation benefits but find existing tools too technical or time-consuming to set up
pain_point_evidence: Users report productivity apps 'can take a while to learn fully' and need 'conversational AI' for easier setup
core_loop: Speak automation rules in natural language
differentiation: Voice setup vs. manual configuration, conversational vs. technical interface
subscription_fit: Premium includes unlimited rules, advanced natural language processing, and team sharing

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic voice rules, premium for unlimited automation and advanced features
